title: Miley Cyrus treats herself to shopping spree after landing in hospital
text:
Miley and her mum Tish spent their millions (Picture: MEGA)

Miley Cyrus sure knows how to treat herself, as she went on a shopping spree with her mum Tish on Sunday.

The Slide Away star engaged in a little retail therapy after what you could describe as a rollercoaster of a few months.

After she split from husband Liam Hemsworth back in August, she had a short relationship with Kaitlynn Carter that was marred in controversy seeing as we saw the pair kissing as the news emerged she wasn’t with Liam anymore.

They split late month and now she’s taken up with Aussie singer Cody Simpson. However that new relationship was also put through the wringer when Miley landed in hospital last week.

So, yeah, you could say the 26-year-old deserved a little time buying some nice things.

Those shopping biceps got a work out (Picture: MEGA)

She caffeinated up (Picture: MEGA)

She was spotted alongside Tish toting armfuls of bags as they went on a jaunt to Studio City.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Wearing a plain white t-shirt tucked into blue jeans, along with a pair of black boots and a tan cap, the star flexed her biceps carrying goods from All Saints and Bloomingdales.

Miley’s worth a few hundred million (if you need specifics, we’re talking in the region of $160m [£131.7m], so that’s cool), so we’re sure her spree made hardly a blip in her massive fortune.

It comes after she’d earlier spent the morning with her new beau Cody as they stepped out for a coffee date.

Earlier in the day, she hung with new boyfriend Cody (Picture: MEGA)

Clearly these two love a good morning meeting as the day before, they were spotted enjoying breakfast at Aeirloom Bakery with Miley’s mum Tish.

The lovebirds seemed to be in chirpy spirits as they chatted excitedly while walking back to their car.

It comes after Miley’s ex-husband Liam Hemsworth went public with his new romance with Dynasty actress Maddison Brown on Thursday.

Miley and Liam split in August (Picture: Getty Images)

Everyone’s moving on it seems – this really is the end.

Still, in an interview with People, Miley’s new boyfriend Cody made a playful dig towards Hunger Games star Liam saying Miley overlooked him because she was ‘happy with another Australian’ instead.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Cody later opened up about his relationship with Miley, stating: ‘The reason why it hasn’t been a really crazy sudden thing is just because we’ve been friends for so long.

‘[We’ve] found each other again in a space where we’re both not partying, working real hard, and it just keeps things healthy and it’s good.’

description: Miley Cyrus knows how to treat herself as she spends her millions on shopping spree amid new relationship with Cody Simpson
